channel.title: Hello World! I'm Gustaf.
channel.description: Recent content on Hello World! I'm Gustaf.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi There! Hope you well. My name is Gustaf. Currently worked as Backend Engineer at Kudo and worked at Digital Goods team. My main programming language is Go Language since that is a language that I used on my jobs, and falling in love with Golang ❤️ I started working as a Frontend Developer after graduated from college. And got the opportunity to switch roles as Backend Engineer until now.
